food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am usually yellow when ripe.

food.question: I am white and cold. I'm good with cookies and cereal! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I keep you cool when you drink me.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Doctors say I keep them away! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 You can pick me from a tree

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and bunnies love to eat me! What am I?
I am a shape. I am usually made of bread, cheese, and tomato sauce! What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I can be cut into slices.
🧀 I taste great with melted cheese.

food.question: I am a small, green veggie that looks like a tiny tree! What am I?
I am sweet and juicy, and grow in bunches on a vine. Sometimes I'm green, sometimes purple! What am I?
I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and bright green inside. I'm a bit sour, but very yummy! What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 I'm the same name as a flightless bird from New Zealand.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, but I'm long and crispy, and often served with burgers! What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a popular side dish.

food.question: I am a drink, and I'm made from lots of different fruits and vegetables all mixed together! What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 I'm a healthy way to get vitamins.
🌈 I can be lots of different colours.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I live in a hive with many others

bug.question: I am a very small insect. I march in lines and work together. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I can carry things much bigger than myself

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then turn into something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves when I am young

bug.question: I jump very high and like to eat plants. I am often green. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often found in fields

bug.question: I am a red bug with black spots. People say I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 Gardeners like me because I eat other bugs

bug.question: I am a long, thin bug that glows in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 People like to catch me in jars

bug.question: I build a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My web is like a trap
🏠 I live in the corner of your room

bug.question: I fly around lights at night and have big, beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I am attracted to the moon
🐛 I start as a caterpillar too, but I'm nocturnal
💡 People sometimes confuse me with butterflies

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer. I live in trees for many years before coming out. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 You can hear me in the heat
🌳 I leave behind a shell when I emerge
🎶 I sing loudly to find a friend

bug.question: I am a beetle that rolls balls of dung. What am I?

hints.text: 💩 I use my poop to transport!
🇪🇬 People in ancient Egypt thought I was special
⚽ I'm strong enough to move objects bigger than me
